section.title: Obtaining the Libraries
section.p:
The current source and binary distribution for both the Java and C++ libraries are available from the ASF distribution directory. Archived distributions are available from the ASF archive distribution directory. In addition, all distributions are available from the
project site.

section.title: Validating Distribution Signatures
section.p:
All distributions are provided with signature .asc files. These contain PGP signatures for the related distribution. You should validate these using the keys found in the
key file downloaded from the Apache site.
section.source: % pgpk -a KEYS % pgpv xml-security-bin-1_4_3.zip.asc or % pgp -ka KEYS % pgp xml-security-bin-1_4_3.zip.asc or % gpg --import KEYS % gpg --verify xml-security-bin-1_4_3.zip.asc
